Erika Holycross (Prestige Estate Services)

★★★★★ 4.7/5 (1 reviews)

About Erika Holycross (Prestige Estate Services)

Erika Holycross (Prestige Estate Services) provides professional art appraisal services in Cleveland. With expertise in Fine art (19th–21st century), Antiques, they offer reliable valuations for insurance, estate planning, and donations.

Specialties

Fine art (19th–21st century)Antiques

Services

  • Insurance appraisals
  • Estate appraisals
  • Donation appraisals
  • Equitable distribution evaluations

Pricing

Non-regulated: $175/hour; IRS-regulated: $225/hour

Certifications

  • ISA
  • USPAP compliant

Contact Information

Location: Cleveland, OH

Website: www.artappraisers.org/

Experience: Over a century combined team experience (firm)

Additional Information

Holds a Master's in Fine Arts; former auction-house manager
